channel.title: Heres an idea, more updates!
channel.description:
moparscape 20/10 but needs more updates alot of cockend twats still uploading shit to websites and advertsing shit to us which is ither leaked or contains a virus can you plz get together and kinda put a stop to this? got a few ideas of my own..i duno if u can do it..but here they are
Public Removal Ability If a thread get -10 people disliking the post then the thread should automaticly be removed if theres a virus found then the fuckers should be IP, Net banned..to make sure they cant even make a connection
daily bann proxies *just like the onse ppl use at school* so that cunts cant get around into the website
issues can be raised about these ideas heres an idea for you dont disslike em.. just add what 'YOU' think should be updated

item.title: Heres an idea, more updates!
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

There is a suggestion thread. I think it is there to stop threads like these!

Read full topic

item.title: Heres an idea, more updates!
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“liverare, post:5, topic:330838”]look, dont tell me how to do shit cus i aint a kinda guy who spends hours working on stuff
all i want is a client n sorce that will work inside collage on a lan connection…[/quote]
I’m sure most college can at least use proper grammar.

Read full topic

what the fuck are you talking about

item.title: Heres an idea, more updates!
item.dc:creator: @liverare liverare
item.description:
@liverare wrote:

look, dont tell me how to do shit cus i aint a kinda guy who spends hours working on stuff
all i want is a client n sorce that will work inside collage on a lan connection…
but seems last 2 sources i tried have got viruses…

Read full topic

item.title: Heres an idea, more updates!
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

this isn’t a game, you can’t really have frequent updates.
advertising can’t be stopped, there’s nothing we can do other than censor out websites or install shitty scripts to slow them down temporarily.

having the community be able to remove threads could be abused easily. get 10 friends to -10 a thread and it’s gone

Read full topic

item.title: Heres an idea, more updates!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Pointless topic.

[quote=“liverare, post:1, topic:330838”]Public Removal Ability
If a thread get -10 people disliking the post then the thread should automaticly be removed[/quote]

iirc this has already been suggested. I’m not sure whether it’s being worked on or not though.

Read full topic

item.title: Heres an idea, more updates!

item.description:
